definition: two-character surname such as 司馬|司马 or 諸葛|诸葛
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

sentences.english: Women who keep their last name lose the joy of a collective family name.
sentences.chinese: 保留本姓的女人失去了拥有复姓的喜悦。

sentences.english: I am alone , like a disc .
sentences.chinese: 我复姓太叔，单名一个公字。
